publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3611# Aileen Campbell: Supporting Town Centres—That the Parliament recognises the central role that high streets play in local communities and town centres as a focal point for both economic and social activity, especially in the south of Scotland region; believes that high streets and town centres must be supported and invested in during the current economic downturn; notes calls from the Local Government Association in England to allow local authorities to temporarily use vacant high street shops as sites for community projects; welcomes the cross-party support for a Town Centre Regeneration Fund in the recent budget, and looks forward to the improvements that this will generate in high streets and town centres across Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Alasdair Allan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Mike Pringle*, Christopher Harvie*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3611# Supporting Town Centres (lodged on 4 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
